comment.author: 43688219@N00
comment._content: I'm sure you're already aware of his Australian Army papers, which includes an eye-witness account of his death. recordsearch.naa.gov.au/scripts/Imagine.asp?B=3091396 His father Aaron seems to have been very active both as a businessman and philantrhopist. www.oztorah.com/2010/07/jewish-scholarship-in-sydney-betw... (There are a number of registrations of patents in his name in the Australian National Archive). He features in this family tree leightonromanisfamily.com/getperson.php?personID=I1410&am... His death was announced in the Tuesday 14th August edition of the The Melbourne Argus. (It looks like father Aaron is described as a J.P.) trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/1642744 Finally, his headstone, www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=pv&GRid=135594...

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/43688219@N00] Thanks for all the links to such fascinating information - not aware of any of it previously, so a very welcome addition to his page.
